doc.title: Architecture - docling-rag-agent
doc.snippet: Prerequisites: Python 3.11+ (3.10+ minimum), UV Latest version (package manager), PostgreSQL 16+ with PGVector extension, Docker Latest (for containerized development), Git Latest (for version control). Setup commands include uv sync, cp .env.example .env, psql setup, streamlit run app.py.

doc.title: Architecture - docling-rag-agent
doc.snippet: GitHub Actions workflow includes lint (ruff check zero warnings), type-check (mypy zero errors), test (pytest with coverage >70%), build (Docker build test), secret-scan (TruffleHog OSS scan). Release workflow triggers on git tag creation.
